participant_1.background:
I am more of an introvert and would rather spend my time reading or watching Ted Talks than scrolling through social media.
I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
i have been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
I want to share a Coke with my family.
I'm from the Midwest, where I learned to love the arts and crafts.
i have two kids , ages 2 and 6.
i love country music.
I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm good, thanks! What do you do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends, especially my two young children. We love to do arts and crafts together.
That sounds fun! I'm more of an introvert, but I love watching Ted Talks and reading books.
I love to read too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like. I'm also really into country music.
Me too! I love listening to country music while I'm driving.
What are some of your favorite country artists?
I love Eric Church, Carrie Underwood, and Luke Bryan.
Those are great artists! I love Eric Church too.
Me too! I'm also really into ghosts.
Really? I've always been fascinated by ghosts too!
I love watching ghost shows and reading about them.
Me too! I've never seen a ghost, but I'd love to.
Me too! I think it would be an amazing experience.
It would be! I guess we'll just have to keep watching ghost shows and hoping for a sighting.
Haha, yes! I'm sure we'll see one eventually
